sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WF_PopulateSpaceAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Ajax calls for space record value population.</description>
        <name>WF_PopulateSpaceAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WF_PopulateSpaceAjax = Class.create();
WF_PopulateSpaceAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	fetchSpaceType : function () {
		
		var retObj = {};
		var spaceTypeId = this.getParameter('sysparm_space_type_id');
		var spaceTypeGr = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_space_type');
		if(spaceTypeGr.get(spaceTypeId)){
			retObj = {
				spaceTypeCat : spaceTypeGr.getValue('u_space_type_category'),
				occupiableStat : spaceTypeGr.getValue('u_occupiable_status')
			};
		}
		
		return JSON.stringify(retObj);

	},
	//fetch parent building details which are constant for child
	fetchBuildingDetails : function () {

		var retObj = {};
		var parentBuildingId = this.getParameter('sysparm_parent_id');
		var grBuilding = new GlideRecord('sn_wsd_core_building');
		if(grBuilding.get(parentBuildingId)) {
			retObj = {
				zip : grBuilding.getValue('zip'),
				city : grBuilding.getValue('city'),
				state : grBuilding.getValue('state'),
				country : grBuilding.getValue('country')
			};
		}
		return JSON.stringify(retObj);
	},
    type: 'WF_PopulateSpaceAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K105800</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-08 23:04:28</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7fb25e83dbdab918557c8e39139619c9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WF_PopulateSpaceAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7fb25e83dbdab918557c8e39139619c9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:25:25</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
